ygData.subject: RE: RE: Hey this sounded interesting.. *Time to KABOING ??*
ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome!!! For me its kinda a toss up - both Rivervale and HH will have some people I know so I stop and talk to and that considerably delays things!  For me -
ygData.messageBody:
Welcome!!!

For me its kinda a toss up - both Rivervale and HH will have some people I
know so I stop and talk to and that considerably delays things! For me -
I'd be hard pressed to make Frep to Qey in under an hour and a half - and
that if I don't stop to loc corpses or kill Broon for fun.

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 30th song
<Spirit of the Moon>
somewhere on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: David Knadler [mailto:dknadler@...]
Sent: Monday, October 04, 1999 2:03 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Hey this sounded
interesting.. *Time to KABOING ??*
Importance: Low

From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>

I personally consider going through HH to be quicker than
River, Misty,
Runny, Gorge. The zone loading time is the factor (IMO).

Qeynos to Freeport in 20 minutes? Kind of a stretch, if you
ask me. With
the MM battledrum, perhaps in 25.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 28 Bard (Povar)

p.s.
My first post!!
